title: Donald Trump Elected 45th President
body: Donald Trump won the 2016 presidential election, shocking many and signaling a major shift in American politics.

title: Capitol Riot
body: Supporters of President Trump stormed the U.S. Capitol to disrupt the certification of the 2020 presidential election results, threatening the peaceful transfer of power.

title: Donald Trump Elected 47th President
body: Donald Trump won the 2024 presidential election, returning to the presidency after his previous term ended in 2021. The election results marked a significant moment in American political history with Trump becoming the first former president to regain the office since Grover Cleveland.
